> last modified 04/12/2024

:::{.callout-warning title="Note"}

The SWFSC Openscience is housed under the SWFSC Github Enterprise and the contribution is restricted to the SWFSC Github enterprise account holder
:::

### Minor Updates - It's easy! 
If the update is simply gramatical/spelling errors which would not affect the content or context of the page, contributor can edit directly on the Github page.
